data.eml:eml: A taxonomy review of Oreoderus Burmeister, 1842 from China with a geometric morphometric evaluation (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae, Valgini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Sha, Ricchiardi, Enrico, Bai, Ming, Yang, Xingke (2016): A taxonomy review of Oreoderus Burmeister, 1842 from China with a geometric morphometric evaluation (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae, Valgini). ZooKeys 552: 67-89, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.552.6096, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.552.6096
